title: Apple highlights range of educators instrumental in shaping TV+ movies and shows for kids
content:
In a press release from Apple, the Cupertino company announced its kids’ education changemakers initiative for Apple TV+. Joining acclaimed education leaders and creative storytellers together, this project aims to create inspiring Apple Original series for kids. 

more…

The post Apple highlights range of educators instrumental in shaping TV+ movies and shows for kids appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple announced their kids’ education changemakers initiative for Apple TV+ to create original and enriching series for kids.
